title: Richard George (athlete)
text:
Richard Lloyd George (born May 22, 1953 in <a href="Fillmore%2C%20Utah">Fillmore, Utah</a>) is an American <a href="javelin">javelin</a> athlete. He represented his country at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>.
Education.
George went to <a href="Brigham%20Young%20University">Brigham Young University</a>, earning a BA in Economics and <a href="Harvard%20Business%20School">Harvard Business School</a>, earning an <a href="MBA">MBA</a>.
Career.
He served as Vice President of <a href="Southern%20Virginia%20University">Southern Virginia University</a>. He was CEO of General Resonance LLC and Clene NanoMedicine Inc.
Personal.
He married the late Jennifer Geer (1976 to 2015). They had six children. He later married Ann Peterson Tempest in 2018.
